QuestData.Title: What We Know of the Naga
QuestData.Description:
I owe you a debt. That much is clear.
My mind still reels from the zoatroid's influence, but I fear the others suffer more visible wounds.
Apply this salve to their wounds, and I will do my best to share what I know of the naga.
QuestData.LogDescription: Tend to the Ankoan's wounds and hear what Adaru has to say about the naga.
